talk0009:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>Wha— A person?!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>Whew, sorry, I never thought I'd run into
another person down here.

Fell down a sinkhole, did you?<sp:5:0:0> So did I,
my guy!

My name's Ponthos. I'm a member of a
caravan squad.

Or I was before monsters attacked the
oasis, and I ditched my friends and ran.
That's how I wound up down here.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh_00>I've looked all over the place, but I still
can't find an exit.

You and me might be down here for a
long, long time.
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Well, that's not good...<sp:5:1:0> Have you told our
leader over there the bad news yet?
talk0041:
But I think I caught a glimpse of <clr:0000>Ponthos<clr:ffff>
running out through the <clr:0000>west entrance<clr:ffff>...
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I know someone in <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff> is on the
lookout for stuff like this, so I was going
to see if they could appraise it.
But I'll let you have it, my guy!


<sp:3:0:2:0100>It's the rarest thing I've got, and it's all
yours. Take good care of it for me!
talk0032:
The name's Ponthos.<sp:5:1:0> I'm a member of the
caravan squad. Or at least I was...<sp:0:4:0>When the oasis we were guarding was
attacked by monsters, I ditched my pals
and ran...<sp:5:0:0>straight into a sinkhole.
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You must have seen one by now! The
places in the desert where the flow of
sand gets all swirly, like a whirlpool?
One false step into one of those and it'll
suck you right in. They're a constant
worry to travelers around here.
Rumor has it that there are actually <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>
hidden under those sinkholes...

<sp:3:0:2:0300>I'm not about to investigate though.
Those things are scary.
talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>You're kidding!<sp:5:1:0> There's a cave beneath
that sinkhole?<sp:5:1:0> And Ponthos went and got
himself stuck down there?
How are we supposed to get him out?
Those sinkholes are so dangerous—can
we even attempt a rescue mission?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well...<sp:5:1:0>I suppose I should just be grateful
that Ponthos is relatively safe. I'll take
what good news I can get!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you for letting me know!
talk0021:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Kinda makes me wonder though... Could there really
be a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> under that sinkhole?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Oh, hello there, young man! Are you here
to tell me you've found Ponthos?

...


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Apparently not...
talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Oh, hello, young man! Have you come to
tell me that you've found Ponthos?
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If we get lost in the desert, our squad's
rule is to wait for rescue in <clr:0000>a place that
stands out<clr:ffff>—like near a tall building.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But there are a lot of <clr:0000>sinkholes<clr:ffff> in this
desert, and they can really trip you up.<sp:0:4:0>I don't even want to think about what
would happen if you fell in.<sp:0:4:0>Our chances of finding him would be low
enough without the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>, but
with it... <sp:5:1:0>Please be OK, Ponthos.
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I want to save Ponthos right away, of
course, but... To think he fell into a
sinkhole, of all things.
Oh, what to do...
talk0023: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>You gotta tell me, how'd you pull this off?
talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Honestly, it's kinda just taking up space.
I'd love for you to take it...<sp:0:4:0>But the guy it belongs to is kinda <clr:0000>stuck in
a cave under a sinkhole <clr:ffff>right now.<sp:0:4:0>If he ever comes back, though, you should
definitely ask if he's willing to part with it.
talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What?! Ponthos got swallowed up by
a sinkhole?!<sp:5:1:0>
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Gra ha ha! Yeah, I really owe my guy for
this one!
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>Young man, please! Have you seen a
fellow with a scruffy beard around here?
talk0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Agh, now what?<sp:5:1:0> How are we supposed to
get the guy out of a sinkhole?<sp:0:4:0>I wonder if that cave he's in has another
entrance somewhere...
talk0026:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>Wha— <sp:5:1:0>A person?!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>Wh-<sp:5:0:0>where did you come from?


<sp:3:0:2:0500>I thought I'd searched everywhere, but I
couldn't find a way out of this place.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I still can't believe there was a whole cave
under a sinkhole.<sp:0:4:0>What a relief you and Ponthos made it
back safely!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_01>Between the storming sands and the rush
of people, everything was a chaotic blur...

I could barely see a thing!
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You're the one who rescued Ponthos!<sp:0:4:0>We've all been waiting for a chance to
thank you.<sp:5:0:0> Please talk to the leader of
our caravan squad when you can!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Thank you so much!


I better hurry back—I'm sure my friends
are worried sick.

Oh, but I still want to give you a proper
<clr:0000>reward<clr:ffff>. Drop by Kara Kara Bazaar when
you get a chance!
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>S-sorry, that was rather abrupt.


We're the caravan squad, a merchant
group hoping to trade in Gerudo Town.
Our friend Ponthos has, uh, disappeared.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>When Kara Kara Bazaar was attacked by
monsters, we all ran, taking refuge in
the inn.
I thought Ponthos was with us the whole
time, but when we finally caught our
breath, he was nowhere to be found.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh>If only I'd stuck with the rest of the
caravan squad.

I've searched everywhere for the exit, but
I keep coming up empty. We might never
get aboveground again.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_00>I thought I heard some kinda commotion.
Look at that, we've got a path out of here!

Did you do all this, my guy?!
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>How about this orb, my guy! It has a weird
pattern on it, and it's probably rare, right?

Whatever it is, you know it's cool! Trust
me, I'm a merchant—I've got an eye for
things like this.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Still no sign of Ponthos.<sp:0:4:0>I could have sworn I saw him run <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>
into the desert too.<sp:0:4:0>But with that big <clr:0000>sinkhole<clr:ffff> out there,
I can't help but worry.
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Truth be told, it's kind of a nuisance, so
I'd love to give it to you...

But its owner is <clr:0000>currently missing<clr:ffff>.


If you'd like it, how about making a deal
with him when he comes back?
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Sorry, that was rather abrupt. But it's our
friend Ponthos. He's gone missing!

When Kara Kara Bazaar was attacked by
monsters, we ran away together, taking
shelter at the local inn.
But when I finally had my wits about me,
I realized Ponthos had disappeared.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh! I bet we can climb that ladder up to
the surface!
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If we're lost in the desert, our squad's
rule is to wait for rescue in <clr:0000>a place that
stands out<clr:ffff>—like near a tall building.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But with all the <clr:0000>sinkholes<clr:ffff> in this desert,
it's easy to get tripped up.<sp:0:4:0>And I'd rather not find out what would
happen if I fell in one...
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>This young man saved your life! We all
owe him for that.

Though no matter how many times I hear
it, I still can't believe anyone survived
falling into a sinkhole.
As the leader of the caravan squad, allow
me to thank you for bringing Ponthos
back to us.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>And as a reward...
